page.title: 06Poor Clare's Convent
page.content: The{Convent}of Poor Clare's is situated on the A27 just east of Arundel. It stands in 4 acres of land and presently houses 43 nuns. Their ages range from 22 to 90 and most have entered orders by vocation. Poor Clare's is a{closed Order}related to the{Franciscans}and with similar vows of poverty. Some nuns work at the printing press, others at gardening, husbandry, vestment making, calligraphy, catering, craftwork etc., which contributes to the upkeep of the Convent. The nuns use their abilities to try to keep the Convent self-contained. Some prepare the food and there is an infirmary for the sick and aged. They may have 6 free days each year when they need not perform their duties and they may receive visitors.
